level.heading: Vehicles exempt from fee.
level.text: All motor vehicles and trailers owned and officially used by the government of the United States, the government of the District of Columbia or the Washington Metropolitan Area Transit Authority shall be subject to inspection.

level.heading: Cross References
level.text: Publicly owned vehicles, see § 50-201 et seq.

level.heading: Effect of Amendments
level.text: D.C. Law 13-289 rewrote the section which had read:

"All motor vehicles and trailers owned and officially used by the government of the United States or by the government of the District of Columbia or by the representatives of foreign governments, shall be subject to annual inspection, such inspections to be furnished without charge."

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 13-289
level.text: For D.C. Law 13-289, see notes following § 50-401.
